bathroom â‡€ Dental Lace

What do they make

Refillable, compostable, (optionally vegan) floss.

Visit Dental Lace

Why Less Mess recommends

Dental Lace does just one thing: Floss. They do that one thing very well. They offer both a bees-waxed-silk floss and a vegan alternative in a refillable glass jar with completely plastic-free packaging, with the used-up floss being compostable to boot. One-offs or subscription service available.

We're a work in progress

This site doesn't take any fees or payment for recommendations, it's simply a list of products and services we know work well for normal people who just want to make Less Mess in the world.
